channel.title: CVE Feed for propertyhive -- PropertyHive

item.title: CVE-2024-3607|2024-05-02T16:52:44.991Z -- propertyhive -- propertyhive
item.description: The PropertyHive plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the delete_key_date() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.12. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to delete arbitrary posts
